text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Looks like I'll be first to the<n>finish line. ☆

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Don't be so sure! I'm right on your<n>tail!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Grrr! I won't lose!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant... Air Groove...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Ngh! I've completely lost sight of her!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oh, Dober! You're just the person I<n>wanted to see!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Kawakami?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I found a potential shortcut, but<n>there's a huge boulder
blocking the<n>path!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
If you'd like, why don't we work<n>together? The two of us
could<n>probably hurl the boulder into oblivion<n>and take the
lead, just like that!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: H-hurl? A boulder?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. ♪ I'm sure we can do it with<n>our combined
strength... My princess<n>instincts are telling me so!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(What should I do? If what Kawakami<n>says is true, I might
be able to catch<n>up with Air Groove.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Even if I stay on this path, I won't be<n>able to close the gap
between us... I<n>need to do something!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: All right. Let's do it.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Thank you! ♪ Now... let's get to it!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Okay, push on three! One, two, three!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Out of our WAAAY!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
We did it! Alone, we may be lacking,<n>but with the power of
teamwork, no<n>obstacle can stand in our way!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Erm... Did you really need me here?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Of course! Come, let's proceed! ♪

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, a dead end? There's no way<n>we can hurl an entire
cliff out of our<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
What's with that signboard? "The<n>road shall not open for
those who lack<n>beauty"?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: W-weird... Is it a riddle?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
There's no doubt Ms. Beauty put it<n>here, but I have no idea
what it<n>means...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Nnngh, neither do I! Let's take a<n>break before my brain
short-circuits!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: By the way... Why did you decide to<n>audition, Dober?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I signed up in order to get<n>closer to becoming the
ideal princess.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Getting closer to an ideal... Maybe I<n>did it for a similar
reason.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I get nervous and can't run my best<n>when people are
watching me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
So I thought becoming a muse might<n>boost my confidence
and help me<n>grow a little.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
But I haven't changed at all. I can't<n>even catch up with Air
Groove.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hmmm! I don't know about that!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Just stepping out of your comfort<n>zone and taking on this
audition<n>means you've already started to<n>grow.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: The most important thing is thedesire to improve yourself. It's allabout working toward becoming your ideal self!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Kawakami...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I want to become a princesseven a world-class designer willacknowledge...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
And you've got the same look in your<n>eyes. I can see that
you have an ideal<n>version of yourself that you want to<n>be.
That's why I asked you to help<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I... see.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
If you're ever stuck in a rut, I'm<n>certain we can push
through it<n>together with guts and determination,<n>just like
we did with that boulder!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I'll always be happy to lend you a<n>hand. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's reassuring. Thank you,<n>Kawakami.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(The only thing I need to focus on is<n>moving forward. That
way I can<n>become the person I want to be, just<n>like
Kawakami is doing.)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, someone's fired up! ♪ Okay,<n>now we just have to
solve the riddle<n>on this signboard...
UWAAAUGH!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Wh-what was that?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: It came from the direction of the<n>stream... Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Gasp!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Where am I?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Air Groove?! Did she fall from that<n>waterfall?!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: What in the world is going on?!
